text.english: I love the LORD, because He has heard My voice and my supplications. Because He has inclined His ear to me, Therefore I will call upon Him as long as I live.
text.arabic: أَحْبَبْتُ لأَنَّ الرَّبَّ يَسْمَعُ صَوْتِي تَضَرُّعَاتِي. لأَنَّهُ أَمَالَ أُذْنَهُ إِلَيَّ فَأَدْعُوهُ مُدَّةَ حَيَاتِي.
